play: Makes me join in a voice channel and play a song.
seek: Changes the position of the current song (Just secounds is supported. Example: ;seek 120).
skip: Skips the current song for the next song in the queue.
stop: Stops the song and clear the queue
volume: Changes the volume of the song.
help: Sends this list here in your private.
invite: Sends my invite in your private.
loop: Enable and disable the repeat in the current song.
resume: Resumes the song that is paused.
pause: Pauses the song that is playing.
search: Searches for the song that you desire to find.
nowplaying: Shows the song that is actually playing.
queue: Shows the queue of the current player
language: [language-code] Changes my language in current server.
shuffle: Shuffles the musics that is on the queue.
remove: Removes a song of the queue.
